noun.description: The quality of being fixed, fastened, or closed firmly.
examples: the tightness of the seal was tested
he increased the tightness of his hold
you can vary the tightness of the knitting
the cook checked the ropes for tightness

noun.description: The state of having or allowing little room for maneuver.
The state of having a close relationship.
examples: he speaks with greater impact because of his tightness with Washington

noun.description: The quality of having only a small margin between winner and loser.
examples: the tightness of the game was very evident
